original_text: As they fled before Israel on the road down from Beth Horon to Azekah, the Lord hurled large hailstones down on them, and more of them died from the hail than were killed by the swords of the Israelites.
korean_text: 그들이 이스라엘 앞에서 도망하여 벧 호론의 비탈에서 내려갈 때에 여호와께서 하늘에서 큰 우박 덩이를 아세가에 이르기까지 내리시매 그들이 죽었으니 이스라엘 자손의 칼에 죽은 자보다 우박에 죽은 자가 더 많았더라

sentences.original_text: on the road down from Beth Horon to Azekah
the Lord hurled large hailstones down on them
and more of them died from the hail
than were killed by the swords of the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손의 칼에 죽은 자보다 더 많았더라
